name: santurce: sabor y arte
description:
"Santurce: Sabor y Arte" is a fictional event concept inspired by the vibrant culture of Santurce, Puerto Rico. The event is a showcase of Puerto Rican music, food, and art.

For this project, I designed an event ticket and promotional poster using Adobe Illustrator, incorporating key cultural elements such as the beach, a cuatro (a traditional Puerto Rican stringed instrument), and Santurce’s iconic colorful houses. I brought the design to life by  animating the poster in After Effects, adding movement that enhances the energy and rhythm of the event.

media.alt: Ticket for admission to the event.

name: miau made
description:
Miau Made is a fictional cat treat brand that strives to bring a playful feel to healthy treats for cats.

As a cat owner, I often found it difficult to find cat treats that were not only healthy but also had unique designs and flavors—especially when compared to the many options available for dogs. This inspired me to create Miau Made and bring some joy to felines and their owners! 

My goal was to create a visual identity that is playful and engaging while still maintaining a clean, modern look that would appeal to a wide variety of cat owners. I created hand drawn doodles in Adobe Illustrator and incorporated them with bubbly typography and bright color palettes to reflect the fun of treat time.

name: dunkin advert
description:
This 45-second animated advertisement showcases Dunkin's menu through playful stop motion and energetic visuals.

Inspired by the wide variety of Dunkin's menu, I wanted to highlight the fun flavors of each of their products.  I began by photographing some of their items and created stop motion animations using Adobe Photoshop. Then, I went into Adobe After Effects and created a motion graphic to encourage viewers to download the Dunkin app and give Dunkin a try.

name: teony
description:
Teaony is a fictional tea brand inspired by the peony flower, known for its delicate sweetness and immune-boosting properties when used in tea.

This project was a personal passion, where I developed everything from the brand concept and name to the visual identity and packaging. This project stemmed from my love of flowers and tea. I designed a floral logo with a delicate type that reflects the elegant and soothing nature of peonies

I designed two distinct tea blends:
The "Calm Blend," infused with peony and chamomile, features a soft purple-blue color to convey relaxation and tranquility.
The "Energy Blend" is a vibrant yellow, symbolizing warmth and an invigorating burst of energy.

name: tender is the flesh
description:
This project presents a series of alternative cover designs for Tender is the Flesh by Agustina Bazterrica, a novel that explores themes of cannibalism and morality. Each design features a distinct visual interpretation of these unsettling themes, aiming to balance subtlety and emotional impact.

The primary cover features a delicate font contrasted by a blood-stained plate, subtly hinting at the novel’s horrific themes.

One variation mimics the appearance of a supermarket meat package ,showcasing how the commodification of human flesh is central to the story.

Another design depicts a human-shaped meat diagram with bold typography, emphasizing the novel’s gruesome and unsettling subject matter.
